title: Refuge Golf Club
seo_description: A beer dinner is brewing on the beach! Take a seat at JRDN on March 3rd as we join forces with Saint Archer Brewing for a perfectly paired 4 course meal for only $55 per person. Space at the table is limited, snag your ticket today!
